[mention=1] is proposing an idea for the new https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6301564 where a random member‚Äôs award could be hidden, and the affected member would need to pay 100 bytes to unhide it. [u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6304717][color=#ffffff]Font Awesome CSS MyCode[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
[mention=1] has developed a new plugin that allows members to easily use Font Awesome icons in their posts through MyCode. Originally built to support features in the upcoming DDoS Arena game, this enhancement is now available forum-wide, offering a stylish and functional way to enrich posts with visual flair. Members can start using the new FA MyCode to insert icons directly into their content.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Security & Geopolitics[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Nuclear Tensions Rising. Following Trump's announcement of repositioning U.S. nuclear submarines in reaction to comments from Dmitry Medvedev, the Kremlin urged restraint, stating they did not interpret this as an escalation but cautioned against incendiary rhetoric.

[b][url=https://www.ndtv.com/world-news/be-very-careful-with-nuclear-rhetoric-russia-after-trumps-submarine-order-9015586]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]U.S. Foreign Policy & Trade Tensions[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Trump administration imposed a 39% tariff on Swiss exports, shocking markets and triggering a Swiss government crisis. President Keller‚ÄëSutter is under fire for what critics describe as a ‚Äúbadly misjudged‚Äù phone call with Trump.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/aug/04/swiss-president-shares-plunge-us-tariffs-trump]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]India Russia Oil Deal Under Scrutiny[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Stephen Miller, deputy chief of staff to Trump, sharply criticized India for continuing to purchase Russian oil, accusing it of effectively financing the Russian war in Ukraine. The U.S. has already implemented tariffs on Indian goods linked to these purchases.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/india/top-trump-aide-accuses-india-financing-russias-war-ukraine-2025-08-03]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Papal Youth Gathering in Rome[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Pope Leo XIV led over a million young worshippers from 150+ countries, delivering a message of unity and global responsibility. He expressed solidarity with communities in Gaza and Ukraine during the Vatican's ‚ÄúJubilee of Youth.‚Äù

[b][url=https://nypost.com/2025/08/03/world-news/pope-leo-xiv-rallies-1m-youths-in-rome-calling-them-the-sign-a-different-world-is-possible]Source[/url][/b]

[color=#72FF84][b]Notable console & hardware releases:[/b][/color]


[color=#FF5F54]MSI GeForce RTX 5080 EXPERT GPU:[/color]

For you PC builders, MSI's powerful new graphics card is ready to launch. It has a special "push-pull" fan system to keep it cool.

[color=#FF5F54]Victrix Pro BFG Reloaded Controller:[/color]

A new pro controller from Turtle Beach's high-end brand. It's super modular, so you can swap parts around to get the perfect layout for you. It's out now in the UK/EU and up for pre-order in the US.

[color=#FF5F54]Razer BlackShark V3 Pro Headsets:[/color]

Razer dropped a new line of its popular BlackShark headsets on July 29th, with special versions for PC, PlayStation, and Xbox.

[color=#FF5F54]Elgato Facecam 4K:[/color]

For all the streamers out there, Elgato released a new high-end 4K webcam to make your stream look extra sharp.

[color=#FF5F54]Nintendo issues a strict warning for Switch 2 Owners:[/color]

Nintendo issued a warning to all Switch 2 users to take caution when playing the new console outside during the hot summer months. The hand held console can malfunction when played in temperatures above 35¬∞C (95¬∞F)

[color=#FF5F54]Steam Beta offers users more customizable options:[/color]

Steam Beta is an optional version of the Steam client that lets users try out new and experimental features before they‚Äôre officially released. Recently, Valve has been focusing on offering more customizable options in the Beta that include:

[list]
[*]Interface customization: Users can tweak the layout, themes, and UI elements of their library and game pages.
[*]Improved notifications: You can now fine-tune what alerts you receive and how they‚Äôre shown.
[*]Overlay and in-game tools: The in-game overlay is more flexible, letting you rearrange windows (like chats, guides, or browser) and choose what stays visible.
[*]Download and storage controls: More detailed settings for managing downloads, bandwidth, and storage locations.
[/list]

Joining Steam Beta is free and optional. Users can opt in via Steam > Settings > Interface > Client Beta Participation.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Tesla teases in-car gaming in Full Self‚ÄëDriving mode[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Elon‚ÄØMusk announced an upcoming Tesla FSD feature enabling video game play while the vehicle drives itself, pending regional regulatory approval. This capability is expected to arrive in 3‚Äì6 months and may coincide with Tesla‚Äôs robotaxi rollout in Chicago.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Microsoft 11 August update introduces AI for accessibility & recovery[/color][/size][/b][/u]

The August 2025 security patch for Windows‚ÄØ11 (version‚ÄØ24H2) adds AI‚Äëpowered enhancements: natural language agent in Settings (Copilot+ PCs only), ‚ÄúClick to Do‚Äù AI features integrated with Teams, expanded Windows Recall options for export/reset in the EEA, and Quick Machine Recovery for remote diagnostics.

[b][url=https://www.windowscentral.com/microsoft/windows-11/8-new-features-arriving-with-the-august-2025-security-update-for-windows-11]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Samsung profit slump amid chip shortages and China export controls[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Samsung reported a 55% drop in operating profit (Q2), largely due to memory chip supply issues and U.S. export restrictions affecting its China business. Despite delays, its XR headset and trifold smartphone launches remain on track this year.

[b][url=https://techchannel.news/news]Source[/url][/b]
